name: Power Fist VR
description:
A lab outside the 7th district secretly created a terrible creature.
Not long ago, strange radio waves were detected in the lab, and creatures began attacking the city as if they were attracted to something.
Soldiers equipped with normal weapons could not defend creatures.

I will support you with special equipment under test.
Protect the city from the attacks of the creatures.


This game is a game that uses the equipment called [Power Fist] to destroy enemies.

It consists of seven missions and survival mode.
You can proceed with the upgrade to a point obtained from the mission and Survival mode.
In Survival mode, you can compare scores with other users.

Use [Reflector] to reflect the enemy bullets.
Then attack with your fists as they approach you.
Use [EX-Mode] with the power obtained by attacking the enemy to blow away enemies nearby.

I wish you victory.
